Detailed Description

Pre Filter Class used to prefilter input images.

Member Function Documentation

bool PreFilter::filter ( Cuda::DeviceMemory< float, 2 > *  input,
Cuda::DeviceMemory< float, 2 > *  output,
const FlowParameters &  params,
bool  bypass = false 
)

Applies all defined prefilters to input image.

Parameters:
[in] Input image.
[out] Filtered output image.
[in] FlowLib parameter structure. There are also the parameters for Str.-Tex. Decomposition.
[in] bypass If bypass is set to true the images are NOT filtered and only copied not matter what filter is selected!

Member Data Documentation

VMLib* CudaFlowLib::PreFilter::tv_denoising_ [private]

Generic set method for Structure-Texture Decomposition.

Parameters:
[in] filter Filter method that is used for str.-tex. decomp.
[in] weight Defines weighting between structure and texture component.
[in] smoothing amount of smoothing for str.-tex. decomposition.
Returns:
TRUE if state was changed. Means if activate switches the filters state.
